WorkItem.Description:
ok, I tried looking around for a fix before posting. I was pretty sure I had frameworks 2.0 installs already but I did it again just incase but it didnt fix my problem
 
The error im getting is:
 
This application has failed to start because the application configuration is incorrect. Reinstalling the application may fix this problem.
 
Well it doesnt =/
WorkItem.Summary: Help, Rawr b13.1 wont load for me.

Comments.Message: Uninstall, then reinstall .NET Framework 2.0 from the link in the readme.
I reinstalled it before and it didnt, work. Thought maybe id try uninstalling it first then reinstalling it like you said but still no go. Continues to give the same error.
Sure you're installing from the link in the readme? Try a restart before and after the reinstall. That's pretty clearly what that error means.
Yea I used the link in the readme and did what you said.
What OS are you running? Do you have Rawr unzipped somewhere you have full permissions to? Is this on a work machine with an extremely locked down global policy?
Its a home PC running Windows XP. I unzipped rawr onto my desktop and have been trying to run it from there. I've got full permissions on this PC of course.

I have occasionally had problems with failed installs/uninstalls of .Net

You may want to try this if all else fails:

http://blogs.msdn.com/astebner/archive/2005/04/08/406671.aspx
That link looks like a possibility. Additionally, try moving Rawr to My Documents or something. The Desktop has some weird permissions sometimes.
Tried both, still giving the same Error :(
I'm out of ideas for you... Try a different machine?
